name: PL/SQL Dynamic Columns
tagline: Multiple virtual columns stored inside a single physical column.
body: An Oracle PL/SQL package to support packing variable number of virtual columns inside a single SQL table column. This package implements functionality similar to that offered by MariaDB Dynamic Columns (https://mariadb.com/kb/en/dynamic-columns/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
